attributes.action: Break off diplomatic relations and cease all economic and social aid to Sudan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
New Labour promised to have an "ethical foreign policy", and this is a chance to partially fulfil that pledge, by breaking off all political and economic ties with the Islamist regime in Sudan.

Ties should only be restored when Sharia law is abandoned and the genocide in Darfur has ceased.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
